Happy Year of the Ox, Travelers!

If you don't know, the year 2021 is the celebration of the Ox - the second animal of the Zodiac that is believed to represent strength and positivity! As a fun event, Paimon is inviting everyone to craft their own Genshin Impact themed greeting card to wish for a prosperous year! Greeting cards can be created digitally or traditionally by hand!

==How to Participate==
Regardless of the style you choose, 100 wholesome winners who leave their most heartfelt creation in the [https://www.hoyolab.com/article/172147 comment section of the official post] will receive the prize of 5 [[Acquaint Fate]]s!

In addition to this, 100 lucky winners who comment a warm message of your blessing to others on the [https://www.hoyolab.com/article/172147 official post] will receive 1 [[Acquaint Fate]]!

Don't forget to include your UID for eligibility to participate!

==Event Duration==
Submission Period: 5 February, 12:00 (UTC+8) - 17th of February, 12:00 (UTC+8)

Winner Announcement: 19 February, 12:00 (UTC+8)

==Friendly Reminders==
#It is not possible for a single UID to win both rewards.
#Comments unrelated to this event and comments on other replies to this post will not be counted as valid event entries.
#This event is open to Travelers from the following servers: America, Europe, Asia, and TW,HK,MO.
#The Genshin Impact Official Community Team reserves the right of final interpretation of this event's rules
